author: Moonsurf
description: Tracks #420 on twitter. It's a good idea to use a secondary Twitter account for this project to maintain the smooth functioning of your main account. Note: This task doesn't issue KOII as a reward. Run the task and get ready to receive the KPL token as a reward!

requirementsTags.description: The username of your volunteer Twitter account. Please ensure your volunteer Twitter account has passed the Twitter verification process.
The password of your volunteer Twitter account.
If verification is required, will use your phone number to login.
